official_title: A bill to establish the Falls of the Ohio National Wildlife Refuge.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to designate and acquire a specified amount of land and water in the States of Kentucky and Indiana for the establishment of the Falls of the Ohio National Wildlife Refuge. Authorizes appropriations to carry out the provisions of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to establish the Falls of the Ohio National Wildlife Refuge.
